poll_list.title: Return Excess MIP65 Funds to Surplus Buffer - March 13, 2023

discourse_list.title: [Request to Poll] Return excess MIP65 funds to Surplus Buffer

content.content: Requesting the DAOs sentiment regarding liquidating the MIP65 ETFs in excess of 500M and returning the funds to the Surplus Buffer. As noted here, this would result in 8,540 IB01 and 73,486 IBTA being sold and proceeds being sent to the SB. Poll 1: Instruct MIP65 trustee to sell 8,540 IB01 and 73,486 IBTA and return proceeds to the Surplus Buffer  Yes No
content.GPT-summary: The author of the post is requesting feedback from the DAO regarding liquidating the MIP65 ETFs in excess of 500M and returning the funds to the Surplus Buffer. The post also includes a poll for the DAO to instruct the MIP65 trustee to sell the ETFs and return the proceeds to the Surplus Buffer. The post may receive constructive criticism and auditing from third parties.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback

content.content: Thanks Mark, We will get this up for voting on Monday with an added “Abstain” voting option. If passed, the relevant text will be included in the copy of an upcoming Executive Vote to provide instruction to the trustees of MIP65.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
